intro: Puccinellia distans f. ambigua, commonly known as the ambiguous distans grass, is a flowering plant belonging to the Poaceae family. It is a perennial herb characterized by its slender,丛生 growth habit and narrow, grass-like leaves. The plant produces small, spike-like inflorescences bearing tiny, greenish flowers. It is typically found in moist, saline or coastal environments, thriving in sandy or muddy soils. This form is distinguished by its morphological variations from the typical Puccinellia distans, including differences in leaf structure and flowering patterns.
